name: Dan Fortunato
body:
### Hey!

I'm a creative programmer and math nerd with a passion for music and design, living in Cambridge, MA. I currently work at [Wolfram|Alpha](http://wolframalpha.com). In the past I have interned at [Apple](http://apple.com), where I made [some new Photo Booth effects](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZyT4YJQoUlg).

### Here's some cool stuff, maybe

* [Duck Quest?](http://wafflefriday.com/files/duckquest.html) -- A nifty game about a mother duck trying to find her lost ducklings! Made by me and [Louie Zong](http://louiezong.com/) at [Waffle Friday Studios](http://wafflefriday.com/).

### Music

I play drums, and a bit of piano too!

* [The American Symphony of Soul](http://americansymphonyofsoul.com/), funk and R&B
* [The Andrew Summerfield Septet](http://summerfieldseptet.bandcamp.com/), jazz
* [Dan and Louie](http://danandlouie.bandcamp.com/), goofy jazz
* [JC & The Dapper Three](http://dapper3.bandcamp.com/), jazz standards
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
